example.eg: The two danced closely all night.
example.egtrans: 这两个人整晚都在亲密地跳舞。

example.eg: Christmas is closely followed by New Year.
example.egtrans: 新年紧跟在圣诞节之后。

example.eg: If you look closely at the painting, you can see the direction of the brush strokes.
example.egtrans: 如果你细看这幅画， 就能看到笔触的方向。

example.eg: The Smiths are a closely-knit group, and always spend the holidays together.
Closely-related languages can often be traced to a single source language.
Smoking is closely related to mouth, throat and lung cancer.
Molecular genetics tells us that humans are more closely related to chimpanzees than to any of the other primates.
Freedom is closely related to responsibility.
The agent examined the evidence very closely.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 仔细检查, 严密检查

example.eg: If you listen closely you can distinguish many birds by their different songs.

dsense.name: listen closely to [sth/sb], listen to [sth/sb] closely

example.eg: The children listened closely to their grandfather's story.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 用心听, 聚精会神地听

example.eg: If you look closely, you will see the beautiful patterns on the butterfly's wings.
She looked closely at the gravestone and could just make out the faded inscription.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 仔细查看, 认真检查
